text: "Our Town" is the debut single by Canadian country music band Cold Creek County. It was written by Todd Clark and Gavin Slate. It was released in April 2015 via Sony Music Canada. ==Chart performance== The song debuted at No. 42 on the Billboard Canada Country charts on May 23, 2015. It was the most added song to Canadian country radio. It reached the Top Ten in June 2015. {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Chart (2015) ! Peak position |- | Canada Canadian Hot 100 | align="center"| 83 |- | Canada Country (Billboard) | align="center"| 7 |} ==References== Category:2015 songs Category:Cold Creek County songs Category:2015 debut singles
title: Our Town (Cold Creek County song)
